intro: Psychotria minor, commonly known as the lesser psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to the tropical regions of Central and South America. The plant typically grows as a shrub or small tree, reaching heights of up to 2 meters. Its leaves are elliptical, glossy, and often have a distinctive dark green color. The flowers are small, clustered in umbels, and usually have a white or pale blue hue.
